description: a(n) is prime and sum of all primes <= a(n) is prime.
links: David W. Wilson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) isA013917(n) = isprime(n) && isprime(sum(i=2,n,isprime(i)*i)) [From _Michael B. Porter_, Jan 29 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Renaud Lifchitz (100637.64(AT)CompuServe.COM)
